examples.name: Image Resizer
examples.description: I have a Python function that resizes user-uploaded images. Images are typically 5-10MB JPEGs from our CDN in Virginia (us-east1). We resize them to 3 different sizes (thumbnail, medium, large). This runs every time a user uploads a photo, which is about 1000 times per day during peak hours.

examples.name: Video Transcoder
examples.description: We need to transcode 4K videos to multiple resolutions for adaptive streaming. Videos are stored in Google Cloud Storage in us-east1 and are typically 2-3 minutes long (about 50GB each). We process around 200 videos per day, mostly during business hours. Not urgent - can be scheduled during off-peak times.

examples.name: API Health Check
examples.description: Simple REST API health check endpoint that returns server status. Runs very quickly, just checks database connectivity and returns a JSON response. Called constantly by our monitoring system, about 10,000 times per day. Needs to be instant.

examples.name: ML Image Classifier
examples.description: Deep learning model for image classification using a pre-trained ResNet model. Images come from our storage in Europe (europe-west1), each about 2MB. The model runs inference and returns classification probabilities. We process about 1000 images per day. Needs GPU acceleration.

examples.name: Log Aggregator
examples.description: Aggregate and compress application logs for archival storage. We have tons of log files from our servers, about 5GB per hour that need to be compressed and moved to cold storage. Runs 24 times per day (hourly). Not time-sensitive, can run whenever carbon is lowest.

examples.name: Payment Processor
examples.description: Process credit card payments and return authorization response. Super critical - needs to run immediately when user clicks 'Pay'. Handles small JSON payloads. We process about 5000 payments per day.

examples.name: Monthly Report Generator
examples.description: Generate comprehensive monthly analytics reports from our database. Takes about 30 seconds to run, pulls 5GB of data from the database and outputs a 2GB PDF report. Runs once per day at the end of the month. Totally flexible on timing.

examples.name: Data ETL Pipeline
examples.description: Extract, transform, and load customer data from various sources into our data warehouse. Processes CSV files that are about 10GB total, transforms them, and loads into BigQuery. Runs every 6 hours (4 times daily). Can be delayed by a few hours if needed.

examples.name: Email Notification Service
examples.description: Send transactional emails to users (order confirmations, password resets, etc.). Very lightweight function that just formats an email template and sends it via SendGrid API. Runs thousands of times per day whenever triggered. Must be instant.

examples.name: PDF Generator
examples.description: Convert HTML invoices to PDF format for customer download. Takes HTML from our database (about 1MB) and generates a PDF (about 500KB). Runs when customers request invoices, maybe 500 times per day. Should be pretty quick but doesn't need to be instant.
